Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Feedback from GenAI is more detailed, and it helps me improve my writing.
Feedback from teachers is trustworthy as they know the purpose of each assignment and how things should be addressed in my assignment.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Teacher feedback made me feel confident when I got it right and unconfident when I got it wrong.

Feedback from AI does not impact my feeling.
